body.name: 40 Pieces Silverware Set, Pearled Edge Silverware Cutlery Set Service for 8, Premium Stainless Steel Flatware Set, Knife Fork Spoon Tableware Set for Home, Restaurant, hotel, Dishwasher Safe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 3 mins
features: Silverware Set For 8 - 40 pieces stainless steel flatware set contains 8 dinner forks, 8 salad forks, 8 dinner spoons, 8 dessert spoons, 8 dinner knives. This silverware set is the ideal set for home daily use and also for a special dinner.

Premium Stainless Steel- Made of decent quality 18/0 stainless steel, BPA free, rust-proof and anti-corrosion can service for a long time. Proper weight and well balance make it comfortable to grip and not easy to bend. Sturdy, sharp blade with fine serrations can cut food easily.

Modern & Elegant - Fashionable style with beautiful pearled-edge handle stands out from ordinary silverware set, this stunning flatware set make every meal like a high-end banquet. It can match many dinnerware and create an luxurious atmosphere for your pleasant dinner experience.

Exquisite Workmanship - Multiple times of fine polishing gives it mirror finished and smooth edges without rough spots, streamline body molding ensure the safety of your lips.The glossy surface makes the reusable silverware easy to clean.

Wonderful Gift - This flatware set induces everything you need in a dinner, it's the ideal gift for family and friends for Thanksgiving, Christmas, Halloween. To keep silverware shiny, recommend not to use wire brushes, hard sponges or other hard materials.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cacoles 40-Piece Pearled Edge Silverware Set. This silverware set includes dinner forks, salad forks, dinner knives, dinner spoons, teaspoons, nice serving for family of 8 on daily use or gathering party. They made of high quality, heavy weight 18/0 stainless steel that ensures safety and durability. There are 8 dinner knives in this set,sturdy, sharp blade with fine serrations can cut food easily and designed in line with holding posture, making it comfortable and easy to use.

This 40 Pieces Silverware Set can Service For 8 Specification: Material:18/0 stainless steel Package Contents: 9.3 inches Dinner Knife x 87.9 inches Dinner Spoon x 87.9 inches Dinner Fork x 87.1 inches Salad Fork x 87.1 inches Tea Spoon x 8

Crafted of food-grade 18/0 stainless steelRust-resistant & sturdy to serve you well for yearsHigh polished and smooth edges without rough spotsExquisite workmanship and elegant shapeFashionable design - Pearled edge handleDishwasher safe

Suitable For Any Formal or Casual Occasions This silverware set creates an elegant and eye-catching appearance, suitable for most tableware and any occasion, enhance your dining experience, wonderful gift for housewarming, wedding, birthday, thanksgiving, christmas.

Using Instruction: Please wash the silverware set with warm soapy water before first use to make sure no manufacturing residue.Please clean the silverware set after using and dry it for their durability.To keep silverware shiny,wire brushes, hard sponges or other hard materials are not recommended，it damages silverware.The silverware set is dishwasher safe so you can run it in dishwasher to save your labor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This set of utensils are very sturdy and fit in your hand very comfortably!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good size, not huge, comfortable in the hand
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to try these out because I was looking for new everyday silverware. My other set has somehow dwindled to just a few spoons and a ton of forks... The design on these is classic and simple. They are a good weight and very shiny. It suggests not using harsh or abrasive cleaners because that would dull the finish. I had to go back to the listing to see if they were dishwasher safe. It didn't mention it on the box or in the instructions. They are dishwasher safe!!The edges are smoothed out so there isn't a sharp edge digging into your finger when using. I love that the forks are not oversized or huge. I hate that most sets are like that. I don't need a pitchfork to eat a salad! These are a very reasonable size.I love that it comes in a set for 12 people. I like to fill the dishwasher before running and when you don't have enough silverware it means you run out quick and then have to wait for the dishwasher to finish or hand wash.I'm glad I ordered these. They are reasonably priced. I might even pick up another set for 8 people just as backup for when pieces inevitably start going missing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not comfortable for me
reviews.reviewText: I, too, found the sharp edges on the handles of this silverware too uncomfortable to hold. Returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value. Sturdy, well made and a large set!
reviews.reviewText: I appreciate just how large this set is with service for 12. That alone makes this an excellent value. What I do like is just how solid this silverware feels and looks. They are heavy and have a simple pearled-edge design that looks great. Build quality is very nice. I have been using them regularly and they have help up well. The weight makes them easy and nice to use. They are a substantial size and they stand out in this category for how much you get at this value. I highly recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and clean design
reviews.reviewText: This set of silverware is very clean looking. They have a heavy-duty strong feel to them and clean well in the dishwasher. I like that the two sizes are noticeably different making it easy to keep them separate. The clean design works well for me. No complaints
